Free Jazz Concert at the Spanish Steps April 27

The Spanish Steps in Sheridan-Kalorama will be the site of a free jazz concert this Saturday April 27 from 1 to 3 pm. Beasley Real Estate is sponsoring the event to benefit the Spanish Steps Preservation Project.

Georgetown's French Market April 19 & 20

Join over 40 Georgetown boutiques, antique shops, restaurants and galleries for the 10th annual Georgetown French Market. Festivities are from 10:am-5:00 pm this Friday, April 19 and Saturday April 20 along the Book Hill section of upper Wiscconsin Avenue.

Why Patrick Mara IS the Best Choice

April is Not So Cruel
